title: 09/06/21 DPS Hour 3
itunes:title: 09/06/21 DPS Hour 3
description:
Jonas Knox, Brady Quinn, and LaVar Arrington, in for Dan, react to the huge weekend in college football and LaVar explains why former collegiate athletes have such a passionate connection to their alma mater. Are the Patriots losing a valuable mentor for Mac Jones after releasing Cam Newton? Tyrod Taylor has been named the starter in Houston, and the guys explore what the future holds for Deshaun Watson. Plus, Saquon Barkley should be returning to action for the first time in a year!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
